name: Idius' Revenge
description:
Controls

Move - WASD

Dash - Spacebar

Shoot  - Q

Interact - E (Will be prompted)

Idius' Revenge is my second game uploaded to itch. You play as Idius navigating through floors of a castle. See how far you can go!

Future Plans: I had some ideas to create more play-styles and enemies.

Was made for my little rougelike 2 - https://itch.io/jam/mylittleroguelikejam2
